app.name: Marathon RED
app.short_description: Marathon RED third party scenario for Wii
app.long_description:
Aleph One ported to the Wii, bundled with RED third party scenario's resources. Compiled by Mathieu Deletrain.
Aleph One/SDL An Open Source 3D action game
